Gordon,

We are building a vertical search engine and are using Heritrix

1. As far as checking pointing is concerned is it supposed to work in  
1.xxx.
My experience has been that it does not work as advertised.

2. Should we switch our production crawl to 3.0?

3. I did not receive an invite to the Internet Archive Heritrix  
meeting in San Francisco.
How do I qualify for an invite to the the meeting?

4. We are planning on converting our semi manual flow to a Hadoop  
automated
flow and would like Hertrix to write directly to HDFS. Is  
HDFSWriterProcessor
going to be part of the main Heritrix release?

5. Is it possible to run more than one crawl job in 1.xxx or do we  
need to launch
new instances of the crawler to do so?

Best,

Derek
